metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8484 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The srec_scan function in bfd/srec.c in libdbfd in GNU binutils before 2.25 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a small S-record.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> last chunk of commit is to revert immediately prior commit, dropping that chunk from our patch

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu3.1').
